errors.cantCreateInstance: Error while creating a Smart Event instance. Please, try again later.
errors.cantDeleteBecauseProcessorsInside: The "{{resource}}" Smart Events instance cannot be deleted until all associated processors are deleted.

errors.cantDeleteTryLater: It is not possible to delete this Smart Events instance. Try again later.
errors.cantFindInstance: The Smart Event Instance you are looking for does not exist. It might have been deleted.
errors.cantUpdateInstanceNotActionableState: You can only update a Smart Event instance that is in either READY or FAILED state.
errors.cantUpdateInstanceGenericError: Error while updating the Smart event instance. Please, try again later.
errors.instanceDetailsGenericError: Error while retrieving the Smart Event instance details.
errors.instancesListGenericError: Error while retrieving the list of Smart Event instances.
errors.invalidName: A Smart Events Instance with this name already exists in your account.
errors.processorsListGenericError: Error while retrieving the list of Processors for this Smart Event instance.
errors.instanceQuotaExceeded: Your organization is out of quota.

instance.instanceWillBeAvailableShortly: Your Smart Events instance will be ready for use shortly after creation.
instance.quotaExceededErrorDescription: To deploy a new instance, delete an existing one first.

errors.cantCreateProcessorBecauseInstanceNotAva: The Smart Events instance you are associating it with is in the deletion phase or does not exist anymore.
errors.cantCreateProcessorOfThatType: It is not possible to create a Processor of that type.
errors.cantDeleteBecauseNotExisting: The Processor you are trying to delete, it does not exist anymore.
errors.cantDeleteTryLater: It is not possible to delete this Processor. Try again later.
errors.cantFindInstance: The Smart Event Instance, related to the Processor you are looking for, does not exist. It might have been deleted.
errors.cantFindProcessor: The Processor you are looking for does not exist. It might have been deleted.
errors.cantUpdateProcessorBecauseNotReadyState: You can only update a Processor that is in either READY or FAILED state.

errors.invalidName: A processor with this name already exists in this instance.
errors.invalidUrl: Please enter a valid URL with http or https protocol.
errors.malformedTransformation: The Transformation Template for the Processor is invalid.
errors.processorDetailsGenericError: Error while retrieving the Processor details.
errors.processorQuotaExceeded: Your organization is out of quota. To create a new processor, delete an existing one first.

processor.noProcessors: No processors for this Smart Event instance
